00035 #ifndef SERIAL_BTSOCKADDRESS_H
00036 #define SERIAL_BTSOCKADDRESS_H

00039 #include <Bluetooth/BtDeviceAddress.hpp>

00041 // for requesting TX and RX MTU size
00042 #define L2CA_TXMTU_SET      0x4000
00043 #define L2CA_RXMTU_SET      0x4002
00044 
00045 // for getting the negotiated TX and RX MTU size
00046 #define L2CA_TXMTU_GET      0x4001
00047 #define L2CA_RXMTU_GET      0x4003
00048 
00049 enum BtProtocol
00050 {
00051     c_bt_protocol_l2cap,
00052     c_bt_protocol_rfcomm
00053 };
00054 
00055 //Socket RFCOMM address
00056 class RfcommSocketAddr : public SocketAddr
00057 {
00058 public:
00060     RfcommSocketAddr();
00065     RfcommSocketAddr(BtDeviceAddress& addr, UINT8 serverchannel);
00067     ~RfcommSocketAddr();
00070     void* GetSockAddr();
00073     INT32 GetSockAddrSize();
00074 
00078     void GetDeviceAddress(BtDeviceAddress& btDevAddr);
00079 
00082     unsigned char GetServerChannel();
00083 
00084 private:
00085     void*      m_rfcommSockAddr;
00086     INT32   m_AddrSize;
00087 };
00088
